title: Single Owner - 100% Ownership
input: GRANT DEED from JOHN SMITH, AN INDIVIDUAL to JOHN SMITH, TRUSTEE OF THE SMITH FAMILY TRUST

buyer_names_component.buyerVesting: TRUSTEE OF THE SMITH FAMILY TRUST

explanation: Single owner = 100% ownership. CRITICAL: Do NOT use 50% for a single owner! Only ONE person = 100%.
